Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.managers

Class AssistantManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.managers.Manager
it.polimi.ingsw.model.managers.AssistantManager
public class AssistantManager extends Manager
Class that contains all the methods that use wizards and assistantCards.

  • Method Details

    • setWizard

      public void setWizard(int playerId, int wizardId) throws NoSuchElementException
      Creates a new wizard with wizardId for the player with playerId. Throws a NoSuchElementException if the player could not be found.
      Parameters:
      playerId - the identifier of the player
      wizardId - the identifier of the wizard
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if the player could not be found

    • setAssistantCard

      public void setAssistantCard(int playerId, int assistantId) throws NoSuchElementException
      Sets the assistant card with assistantId as the current assistant card for the player with playerId.
      Parameters:
      playerId - the identifier of the player
      assistantId - the identifier of the assistant card
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if the player or the assistant card could not be found

    • getValueOfAssistantCardInHand

      public int getValueOfAssistantCardInHand(int playerId) throws NoSuchElementException, AssistantCardNotSetException
      Gets the value of the current assistant card of the player with playerId.
      Parameters:
      playerId - the identifier of the player
      Returns:
      the value of the current assistant card of the player
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if the player could not be found
      AssistantCardNotSetException - if the assistant card has not been set

    • getMovementsOfAssistantCardInHand

      public int getMovementsOfAssistantCardInHand(int playerId) throws NoSuchElementException, AssistantCardNotSetException
      Gets the movements of the current assistant card of the player with playerId.
      Parameters:
      playerId - the identifier of the player
      Returns:
      the number of movements of mother nature allowed by the card
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if the player could not be found
      AssistantCardNotSetException - if the assistant card has not been set

    • getValueOfLastPlayedAssistantCard

      public int getValueOfLastPlayedAssistantCard(int playerId) throws NoSuchElementException, AssistantCardNotSetException
      Gets the value of the assistant card played by the player with playerId in the previous round.
      Parameters:
      playerId - the identifier of the player
      Returns:
      the value of the assistant card played by the player with playerId in the previous round
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if the player could not be found
      AssistantCardNotSetException - if the assistant card has not been set

    • incrementMovementsOfAssistantCardInHand

      public void incrementMovementsOfAssistantCardInHand(int playerId, int extraMovements) throws NoSuchElementException, AssistantCardNotSetException
      Increments by extraMovements the movements allowed by the current assistant card of the player with playerId.
      Parameters:
      playerId - the identifier of the player
      extraMovements - the extra movements allowed
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if the player could not be found
      AssistantCardNotSetException - if the assistant card has not been set

    • moveAssistantCardInHandToLastPlayed

      public void moveAssistantCardInHandToLastPlayed(int playerId) throws NoSuchElementException
      Pops the current assistant card of the player with playerId and makes that card the last played assistant card of the same player.
      Parameters:
      playerId - the identifier of the player
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if the player could not be found

    • getCardValueById

      public int getCardValueById(int assistantCardId)
      Takes the id of the assistant card and retrieves the card value (useful to check if the card is selectable)
      Parameters:
      assistantCardId - the id of the assistant card
      Returns:
      the value of the assistant card

    • getPlayableAssistantCardValues

      public ArrayList<Integer> getPlayableAssistantCardValues(int playerId) throws WizardNotSetException, NoSuchElementException
      Returns a list of card values that the player can play in this round, considering the cards already played by the other players. MANDATORY: to work it's necessary that the players that in this round haven't already chosen an assistant card, have it as null (this player too) - using moveAssistantCardInHandToLastPlayed it's okay.
      Parameters:
      playerId - the id of the player
      Returns:
      a list with the values of the assistant cards that can be played by playerId
      Throws:
      WizardNotSetException - if the player hasn't set a wizard yet
      NoSuchElementException - if the player could not be found

    • isWizardAvailableToBeChosen

      public boolean isWizardAvailableToBeChosen(int wizardId) throws WizardNotSetException
      Parameters:
      wizardId - the id of the wizard to test
      Returns:
      true if wizardId hasn't been chosen by anyone and is still selectable
      Throws:
      WizardNotSetException - this exception can't be thrown because hasWizard already checks for the wizard presence
